com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer

Class BlockPlacer2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer.BlockPlacer2

  • public class BlockPlacer2
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a more accurate version of the simulated annealing hard macro placer found also in this package. It is more accurate in that it tries to traverse critical paths into both ends of the connections made between hard macros.
    Author:
    Chris Lavin
